Issue.creator: jonathan-blood
Issue.summary: EYFN Org3 peers configured to use Org1's CouchDB containers
Issue.description: In Fabric Samples, the peers for Org3 (created when using eyfn.sh) are configured in docker-compose-couch-org3.yaml to use couchdb0:5984 and couchdb1:5984 for peer0.org3 and peer1.org3 respectively. These are the addresses for Org1's CouchDB containers and there should be couchdb4:5984 and couchdb5:5984.
